reporter_caption.center: GONSALVES v. DIST. CT. OF FIRST CIRCUIT, SCPW-11-0000733 (Haw. 10-28-2011)

caption.center: RAYMOND GONSALVES, Petitioner, v. DISTRICT COURT OF THE FIRST CIRCUIT,

opinion.panel: By: RECKTENWALD, C.J., NAKAYAMA, ACOBA, DUFFY, and McKENNA, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the motion for reconsideration of the October 14, 2011 order denying the petition for a writ of mandamus,
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration is denied.Page 1
